pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel

Class CellRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel.CellRepresentation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageCellRepresentation, OverlayCellRepresentation, SlideCellRepresentation, TremblingCellRepresentation

    public abstract class CellRepresentation
extends java.lang.Object
    Graphically represents a cell in a GridPanel
    Author:
    mpmf

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(java.awt.Color backgroundColor)
        Sets the cell's background color. The background alpha value will be applied to the supplied color.
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - the new background color. null disables the background.

      • removeBackgroundColor

      • setBackgroundAlpha

        public void setBackgroundAlpha(double backgroundAlpha)
        Sets the alpha value to be applied to background colors.
        Parameters:
        backgroundAlpha - the alpha value to apply to the cell's background color (between 0 and 1)
